source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a picturesque, static shot looking through the dark silhouette of an ornate structure, like a gazebo or bridge railing, into a city park. The scene is set in autumn, with warm sunlight illuminating the vibrant orange and yellow leaves on the trees. A few people can be seen walking in the background.
